title: Bing Jiao Shidi You Zai Gen Wo Zhuang Kelian
alternative_title: 病娇师弟又在跟我装可怜 ; Bìng Jiāo Shīdì Yòu Zài Gēn Wǒ Zhuāng Kělián ; The Yandere Martial Junior Brother Is Pretending to Be Pitiful to Me ; El Yandere Hermano Menor Pretende Ser Lamentable Conmigo Otra vez
status: 病娇师弟又在跟我装可怜 ; Bìng Jiāo Shīdì Yòu Zài Gēn Wǒ Zhuāng Kělián ; The Yandere Martial Junior Brother Is Pretending to Be Pitiful to Me ; El Yandere Hermano Menor Pretende Ser Lamentable Conmigo Otra vez
description:
Description :
        A graceful lady was reborn as an adorable girl?! Haven't yet rejoiced for her luck to live again, Liu Zhaozhao had already found out her previous pure and good-natured martial junior brother who had been obedient to her has unexpectedly become the arch-villain. What exactly had happened?
